verses.roman:
eta cinti' nimantrila sannyāsīra gaṇe
tabe sei vipra āila mahāprabhura sthāne

synonyms: eta cinti'—thinking this; nimantrila—he invited; sannyāsīra gaṇe—all the sannyāsīs; tabe—then; sei vipra—that brāhmaṇa; āila—approached; mahāprabhura sthāne—the lotus feet of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Thinking like this, the Mahārāṣṭrian brāhmaṇa extended an invitation to all the sannyāsīs of Vārāṇasī. After doing this, he finally approached Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu to extend Him an invitation.
